info.name: Cuez API
info.description:
Interact with Cuez API.

{{base_url}} => [https://api.cuez.app/v1](https://api.cuez.app/v1)

{{jwt}} => obtained by the project/authenticate request

request.description:
Request a JWT token that you need to embed in the headers of all future calls.

api_key: you can find it in the automator section of your Cuez Project

identifier_name: the name of your application

identifier_id: a uid for your own reference

Returns the id of your Cuez project, its name and the jwt token
Get Project info
Fetch all episode templates of a project

Fetch the block template of the project. Containing all definitions of the building stones of an Episode in this Project.  
The blocktemplate is unique for every project
Fetch all series of a project
Fetch the organisation the project belongs to
Query for episodes in a project

Create a new part

place_holder_position is the index the new part should have in the episode. 0 = first part

place_after; the uid of the part the new part needs to be placed after

Update the properties of an item:

is_floating: true or false

title

``` json
color:{
   name: "background/foreground",
   value: "red, pink, purple, blue, light-blue, teal, green, lime, yellow, orange, grey, black"
}
 ```

Update the properties of an item:

is_floating: true or false

title

color:{

name: "background/foreground",

value: "red, pink, purple, blue, light-blue, teal, green, lime, yellow, orange, grey, black"

}

Update the properties of an item:

is_floating: true or false

title

color:{

name: "background/foreground",

value: "red, pink, purple, blue, light-blue, teal, green, lime, yellow, orange, grey, black"

}

is_floating: true or false

title

color:{

name: "background/foreground",

value: "red, pink, purple, blue, light-blue, teal, green, lime, yellow, orange, grey, black"

}
Fetch an episode
Fetch a part

Update the properties of a part:

is_floating: true or false

title
Delete a Part from an episode
Duplicate a part in an episode, the duplicated part will appear under the given part

Create a new part

place_holder_position is the index the new part should have in the episode. 0 = first part

place_after; the uid of the part the new part needs to be placed after

Sort a part in an episode

place_holder_position is the index the new part should have in the episode. 0 = first part

place_after; the uid of the part the new part needs to be placed after

Create a block inside of an item

place_after; the uid of the block_instance where you want to insert the block after

place_after; the uid of the block_instance where you want to insert the block after

}

Fetch an episode
Create an episode
Update the properties of an episode
Archive an episode
Restore an archived or deleted episode
Delete an episode
Fetch a part

Duplicate a part or copy in another episode

ids : an array if part uids you want to copy

parent_id: the uid of the episode you want to copy the part(s) in

place_after: the uid of the part you want to place the parts after
Fetch an episode

Duplicate an item or copy in another episode

ids : an array if item uids you want to copy

parent_id: the uid of the part (of any episode) you want to copy the item(s) in

place_after: the uid of the item you want to place the item(s) after

variable.value: Token obtained from the project/authenticate request
